grafana_proxy_port.description: Set this to the port you want to proxy the Grafana server on.

instance_ami_name.description: The AMI name containing docker to be able to run Grafana

instance_ami_id.description: The AMI ID containing docker to be able to run Grafana

instance_type.description: Choose from t4g < t3a < t3 on pricing (micro/small/medium)

instance_key_name_local.description: The ssh keypair name (on your local machine) that is provided to the instance. Conflicts with `instance_key_name_aws`.

instance_key_pub.description: The public key (user-provided as string) to set in the instance. If empty, the local ~/.ssh folder will be read.

instance_key_name_aws.description: The ssh keypair name (on AWS) that is provided to the instance. Conflicts with `instance_key_name_local`.

instance_ssh_enabled.description: Set to true if you want to enable standard SSH access to the deployed instance.

instance_root_disk_size.description: Disk size of the root block device. 8gb is usually enough.
